column4: seems my window button controls disappear on my active window, they reappear on background windows
should i use a theme manager other than emerald?  it seems to be kind of buggy
You are probably using compiz's window decorator and not Emerald then
i tweaked it with emerald tho.  is emerald the standard way of packaging compiz themes or is there something builtin?  i'm not entirely happy with emerald anyway.
